com.ems.service

Interface EmployeeServiceInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EmployeeService

    @Service
public interface EmployeeServiceInterface
    The Interface EmployeeServiceInterface. Employee Service Interface define contract for all operations required to manage employee management system operations like save, update, delete, filter etc.

    • Method Summary
